thought: To craft purple_concrete_powder, I first need to craft purple_dye, which requires placing 1 blue_dye and 1 red_dye side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the red_dye from slot 20 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
